intro: Dracaena brevifolia, commonly known as the shortleaf dracaena, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asparagaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its compact, upright growth habit and dark green, lance-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically borne in clusters at the base of the plant. It is often cultivated as a ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ability to thrive in low-light conditions. Dracaena brevifolia is also valued for its air-purifying properties and is relatively easy to care for in indoor environments.
